Subject: Fan Reaction

The overall fan interest decreases slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Tony Eusebio
Dear Sir,
Tony Eusebio is hitting the ball well at AA Frisco Rough Riders!
He has an AVG of .358, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/3/1991
Subject: Progress of Pete Schourek
Dear Sir,
Pete Schourek has an ERA of 3.69 at A Rancho Cucamonga Quakes!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
